name: Broiled Skillet Pizza
ingredients: Toppings of your choice: pepperoni, Italian sausage, mushrooms, red onions, green peppers, etc.
utensils: 8-9" round cake pan or nonstick skillet with oven-proof handle

instructions.en: Line pan with nonstick foil or parchment paper, or use a nonstick skillet with an oven-proof handle.
instructions.sk: Vyložte formu nelepivou fóliou alebo papierom na pečenie, alebo použite nepriľnavú panvicu s rúčkou odolnou voči teplu.
instructions.ja: 型に焦げ付き防止ホイルまたはパーチメント紙を敷くか、オーブン対応ハンドル付きの焦げ付き防止フライパンを使用します。

instructions.en: Spread pizza sauce in the bottom of the pan and top with shredded cheese.
instructions.sk: Rozotrite pizzovú omáčku na dno formy a posypte strúhaným syrom.
instructions.ja: 鍋の底にピザソースを広げ、その上に細切りチーズをのせます。
お好みのトッピングを追加します。

instructions.en: Broil on the top rack for about 3-5 minutes or until everything is hot and bubbly.
instructions.sk: Grilujte na hornom rošte asi 3-5 minút alebo kým všetko nie je horúce a bublinkové.
instructions.ja: 上段のラックで3-5分程度、すべてが熱くなり泡立つまでグリルします。

instructions.en: Lift the foil or parchment paper out of the pan and slide the "pizza" onto a dinner plate.
instructions.sk: Zdvihnite fóliu alebo papier na pečenie z formy a zsuňte "pizzu" na tanier.
instructions.ja: ホイルまたはパーチメント紙を持ち上げて鍋から取り出し、「ピザ」を皿に滑らせます。

notes: Makes 1 serving. * Bobo36us used 3 tablespoons of sauce on his but I wanted to keep the carbs to a minimum. I didn't use a skillet for mine because I don't have one with an oven-proof handle.
